name: Babohan Botanics
description:
Babohan Botanic's

A cute, if not somewhat spooky, game with influence from Scottish Folklore and Mythology. Made by a wee group of folks taking part in #GGJ2023 for fun at the Abertay University site #AGLJam23, from the 3rd-5th February 2023!

˚. ୭ ˚○◦˚.˚◦○˚ ୧ .˚ₓ˚. ୭ ˚○◦˚.˚◦○˚ ୧ .˚ₓ˚. ୭ ˚○◦˚.˚◦○˚ ୧ .˚ₓ˚. ୭ ˚○◦˚.˚◦○˚ ୧ .˚ₓ˚. ୭ ˚○◦˚.˚◦○˚ ୧ .˚

Tend to Calla the Baobhan Sith's crops in preparation for harvest, water them and make sure they don't shrivel up in the sunlight. Don't mind her friend Cat Sith, he's just wary of strangers. Help grow the 

Theme: Roots ˚. ୭ ˚○◦˚.˚◦○˚ ୧ .˚ₓ˚. ୭ ˚○◦˚.˚◦○˚ ୧ .˚ₓ˚. ୭ ˚○◦˚.˚◦○˚ ୧ .˚ₓ˚. ୭ ˚○◦˚.˚◦○˚ ୧ .˚ₓ˚. ୭ ˚○◦˚.˚◦○˚ ୧ .˚ Instructions

To cover up the sun with the clouds just click and drag them.
Put on some headphones and enjoy the music*!

Once you reach the blue potion the game is over!

*The web build currently does not support audio. We will fix this shortly until then please download the game for cozy music
